fields.name: CodeId
fields.description: ARM resource ID of the code asset.

fields.name: Command
fields.description: [Required] The command to execute on startup of the job. eg. "python train.py"

fields.name: Distribution
fields.description: Distribution configuration of the job. If set, this should be one of Mpi, Tensorflow, PyTorch, or null.

fields.name: EnvironmentId
fields.description: [Required] The ARM resource ID of the Environment specification for the job.

fields.name: EnvironmentVariables
fields.description: Environment variables included in the job.

fields.name: Resources
fields.description: Compute Resource configuration for the job.
